product_name: Aqua-Bound Sting Ray Hybrid Posi-Lok Four-Piece Paddle
long_description: A 4-piece paddle that breaks down for travel, the Aqua-Bound Sting Ray Hybrid Posi-Lok carbon-shaft kayak paddle is suited to exploring your local waters via a low-angle paddling style. Small-diameter shaft is designed for paddlers with smaller hands, and size of blade is optimized for low-angle paddling and produces a smooth stroke with minimal flutter. Simple, intuitive and strong, the Posi-Lok(R) ferrule uses a 2-button release to detach and adjust feather angle. To join, simply slide the Posi-Lok ferrule together and listen for the audible click. Posi-Lok resists corrosion and completely eliminates play between each piece of the paddle. Feathering is adjustable in the increments of 0 / 45deg right or left. Lightweight carbon shaft provides low swing weight and slight shaft flex, promoting a comfortable experience in the cockpit from launch until takeout. Fiberglass-reinforced nylon blades provide excellent durability when pushing off rocks or barnacles.
short_description: A 4-piece paddle that breaks down for travel, the Aqua-Bound Sting Ray Hybrid Posi-Lok carbon-shaft kayak paddle is suited to exploring your local waters via a low-angle paddling style.
